RelatedSentence: Sri Lanka today is celebrating the peace achieved through sacrifice of lives and not the victory of war , President Mahinda Rajapaksa said addressing the nation at the fifth anniversary Victory Day celebrations in the southern town of Matara today .

Sri Lanka today is celebrating the peace achieved through sacrifice of lives and not the victory of war , President Mahinda Rajapaksa said addressing the nation at the fifth anniversary Victory Day celebrations in the southern town of Matara today .
